metadata.name: Suspicious Process Parents
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious parent processes that should not have any children or should only have a single possible child program

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\minesweeper.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\winver.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\bitsadmin.exe')) OR (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\csrss.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\certutil.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\eventvwr.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\calc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\notepad.exe'))) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\werfault.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wermgr.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\conhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\mmc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\win32calc.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\notepad.exe')) OR process.name is null)))

output.summary: Detects suspicious parent processes that should not have any children or should only have a single possible child program
